articles.description: The Blues fans have not been able to watch their team since March but that will soon come to an end - but with strict limits
articles.content:
London has been placed into Tier 2 coronavirus restrictions once lockdown ends on December 2, meaning Chelsea fans can return to matches at Stamford Bridge in a limited number.

articles.title: Lennox Lewis says Tyson Fury is 'a lot more dangerous' than Anthony Joshua - Daily Mail
articles.description: Lennox Lewis believes Tyson Fury is capable of causing Anthony Joshua an array of problems when the British heavyweights finally meet in the ring next year.
articles.content:
